description: Spring onion adds a crunchy texture to these cakes.
name: Sweet Potato Cakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Dust the cakes in flour, dip in the reserved egg, then lightly coat with polenta. Heat the oil in a non-stick frying pan and add the cakes a couple at a time. Cook for 2-3 minutes or until the underside turns golden, then carefully flip and cook for a further 2-3 minutes, or until evenly golden brown. Serve with lime wedges for squeezing over.
